name: wrdeqi

body.origin:
|- wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Word(c0)= Word(c1)
⊣ c0 = c1
⊣ (c0 = c1 → Word(c0)= Word(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Word(c0)= Word(c1)
⊣ c0 = c1
⊣ (c0 = c1 → Word(c0)= Word(c1))

comment: Equality theorem for the set of words, inference form. (Contributed by AV, 23-May-2021.)
